function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public health regulations","Impact":"Potential for uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establish and enforce public health regulations","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare infrastructure","Impact":"Limited capacity to treat contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in healthcare infrastructure, improve access to medical facilities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote patient monitoring","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Poor building design for health","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Incorporate health-promoting design principles, improve ventilation and air quality","Technologies":"Smart building technology, air purification systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building developers"}]}
